Using [[Yomi]]'s [[Strengthening Prescription: Chakra Injection|snakes]], Kusuna has them bite a target. The bite leaves a purplish colour around the area bitten and causes the target's veins to swell up, after which they become temporarily paralysed.

[[pl:Masui Sejutsu]]
[[pt-br:Tratamento Anestésico]]
